name: Luxury Jetsetter
tagline: First-class treatment, Park Hyatt robes, 3+ cents per point redemptions
description: You don’t just travel — you arrive. You want a full set of cards that handle high-end logistics, elite hotel treatment, and the finest dining, all while maintaining top-tier insurance.

slots.name: The Hub & Insurance
slots.description: Transfer partners + God-tier travel protection.

slots.name: Luxury Food & Dining
slots.description: 4x on worldwide dining and high-end grocery spend.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Chauffeur
slots.description: Retail credits (Saks/Lululemon) and premium airport transfers.

slots.name: Jetsetter Specialists
slots.description: The cards that unlock the 'Park Hyatt' lifestyle.

rules.title: Redemption Floor
rules.description: Never redeem for less than 2.0 cpp; your time is too valuable for low-yield points.

rules.title: The Airport Decider
rules.description: Prioritize Strata Elite if you value Admirals Club, or Platinum for Centurion/Delta lounges.

name: Wallet Freak
tagline: The Final Boss — Issuers Fear You
description: You run every premium card and hit every credit. Your goal is a perfectly optimized wallet where every single purchase is categorized and every benefit is extracted.

slots.name: The Hub Collection
slots.description: Every lounge network and transfer partner ecosystem.

slots.name: Max Food & Essentials
slots.description: Hitting the 6% grocery and 4x dining caps.

slots.name: The Coupon Book Slot
slots.description: Managing the $1,500+ in annual lifestyle credits.

slots.name: The Specialist Feeders
slots.description: Catch-alls for the 0.01% of spend that doesn't fit a category.

rules.title: Credit Mandatory
rules.description: Missing a $10 credit is a cardinal sin.

rules.title: Retention Season
rules.description: Always call for retention offers every 12 months to offset high AFs.

name: Points Strategist
tagline: Transfer Partner Only — 5+ cpp or bust
description: You view points as a currency to be traded. You build a whole setup that feeds into transfer partners for international business and first class.

slots.name: Transfer Hub Core
slots.description: Best partners (Virgin, Flying Blue, Hyatt, ANA).

slots.name: Grocery/Dining Feeders
slots.description: Building the balance through high-frequency daily spend.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Protection
slots.description: Cell phone protection and travel delay coverage.

slots.name: The Specialist Multipliers
slots.description: Cards used solely for their 5-10x multipliers.

rules.title: No Portal Redemptions
rules.description: Unless it's a 10x earn rate on the Strata Elite to build the next bank.

rules.title: Hyatt Rule
rules.description: Chase points always go to Hyatt unless a 30%+ transfer bonus exists elsewhere.

name: Business Powerhouse
description: Your business spend is massive. You need a setup that handles heavy operations and rewards you with first-class travel for the whole team.

slots.name: The Category Destroyer
slots.description: 4-5x on ads, shipping, office, and telecom.

slots.name: The Operational Core
slots.description: SaaS credits (Dell/Adobe) and premium lounges for work travel.

slots.name: Personal Essentials
slots.description: Non-business spend (Grocery/Dining) for the founder.

slots.name: The Specialist Catch-All
slots.description: Uncapped 2.5% for high-limit purchases.

rules.title: Employee Card Stack
rules.description: Issue employee cards to maximize the 3-5x categories on every meal and Uber.

rules.title: 35% Rebate
rules.description: Always use the Biz Plat for flights to get points back.

name: Cashback Pragmatist
tagline: Points Are Cope. Cash Is King.
description: You want a simple, high-yield setup that puts dollars in your bank. No transfer partners, no award charts, just cash.

slots.name: The Flat Rate Core
slots.description: Uncapped 2% everywhere.

slots.name: The 5% Category Nukes
slots.description: Targeted rewards for your highest food/fuel spend.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Utility
slots.description: Streaming and grocery boosts.

slots.name: The Specialist Booster
slots.description: Specific rewards for your niche (Gas/EV).

rules.title: Index Fund Transfer
rules.description: Automate cash back transfers to a brokerage account monthly.

rules.title: No Net AF
rules.description: If a card has an AF, its credits must make it $0 or net-positive.

name: Foodie & Grocery King
description: Your food bill is your largest expense. You need a setup that treats every grocery run and restaurant visit as a high-yield investment.

slots.name: The Hub & Travel
slots.description: Premium travel for food-motivated trips.

slots.name: Grocery Maxers
slots.description: The gold standard for supermarket spend.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Delivery
slots.description: DashPass and Grubhub+ memberships.

slots.name: Foodie Specialists
slots.description: Credits for high-end dining and reservations.

rules.title: $6k Rule
rules.description: Hit the BCP cap early in the year, then switch to Amex Gold for groceries.

rules.title: Resy Mandatory
rules.description: Always use the Resy credit to book hard-to-get tables.

name: Family Freak
tagline: Groceries for an army, Disney bundle, Costco runs — all maxed
description: You manage the household. You need a whole setup that covers wholesale clubs, streaming for the kids, and travel protection for family vacations.

slots.name: The Family Hub
slots.description: Protections and lounge access for the whole crew.

slots.name: Household Essentials
slots.description: 6% groceries and 5% Amazon/Whole Foods.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Kids
slots.description: The Disney Bundle and high-limit retail credits.

slots.name: Big Box Specialists
slots.description: Wholesale dominance (Costco/Sam's).

rules.title: Wholesale Quarter
rules.description: Always max the 5% quarters for wholesale clubs on Freedom/Discover.

rules.title: Phone Insurance
rules.description: Pay the family plan bill with a card that has Cell Phone Protection.

name: Gas/EV Charging Freak
tagline: 5%+ on every gallon/kWh or civil unrest
description: Your life happens on the road. You need a setup that handles gas, EV charging, transit, and roadside emergencies flawlessly.

slots.name: The Commuter Hub
slots.description: Roadside dispatch and flat-rate catch-alls.

slots.name: Fuel & Energy Core
slots.description: Permanent 5% on Gas/EV.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Pitstops
slots.description: Quick dining and morning coffee credits.

slots.name: Travel Specialist
slots.description: Lounge access for long road trip layovers.

rules.title: Fuel App Stacking
rules.description: Stack card 5% with Shell/Exxon app discounts for 50c+ off per gallon.

rules.title: Roadside Primary
rules.description: Use the card with the best roadside dispatch for all long-distance commutes.

name: Online Shopping Addict
tagline: 10–20% back online or I’m not buying
description: You click 'Buy Now' daily. Your setup needs to reward every Amazon box, retail portal, and PayPal checkout.

slots.name: The Digital Hub
slots.description: Portal accelerators and 5% PayPal.

slots.name: The Amazon Core
slots.description: 5% uncapped on Amazon and Whole Foods.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Retail
slots.description: Credits for Saks, Lululemon, and Best Buy.

slots.name: Shopping Specialists
slots.description: Custom categories for online retail.

rules.title: Rakuten Rule
rules.description: Stack card rewards with Rakuten for maximum point/cash multipliers.

rules.title: PayPal Key Strategy
rules.description: When PayPal is 5% rotating, route every possible monthly bill through it.

name: Simple Minimalist
tagline: One or Two Cards. Zero Drama. Maximum Peace.
description: You want the highest return for the lowest effort. A whole setup that fits into two cards but covers travel, food, and protection.

slots.name: The One-Card God Tier
slots.description: Effective 2x-3x on every single purchase.

slots.name: The Food & Rent Support
slots.description: Covering the two biggest daily expenses.

slots.name: The Protection Layer
slots.description: No-fee backup for phone and insurance.

slots.name: Minimalist Specialist
slots.description: Cards that manage themselves.

rules.title: Venture X Math
rules.description: The $300 credit + 10k miles makes the card free; treat it as your 2x everything card.

rules.title: Zero AF Preference
rules.description: Only keep premium cards if the portal credits are 1:1 with the AF.

name: Yuppie Flexer
tagline: Heavy metal, Centurion access, bottle service energy
description: You want a setup that looks as good as the rewards. Heavy cards, elite lounges, and credits that fund your urban lifestyle.

slots.name: The Status Hub
slots.description: Heavy metal and Centurion/Delta lounge access.

slots.name: Urban Dining & Food
slots.description: Uber credits and high-end restaurant access.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Flex
slots.description: Equinox, Saks, and premium chauffeur credits.

slots.name: Flex Specialists
slots.description: Cards with the best physical aesthetic.

rules.title: Lounge Hierarchy
rules.description: Always arrive early for Centurion access; Priority Pass is only for layovers.

rules.title: Credit Flex
rules.description: Use the Saks and Lululemon credits quarterly to maintain your wardrobe.

name: Value Traveler
tagline: Premium perks, net-negative annual fee, minimal effort
description: You travel often but refuse to pay net fees. You need a setup where the credits fully pay for the AF, providing free lounges and insurance.

slots.name: The Free Premium Hub
slots.description: Venture X is the core of this setup.

slots.name: Daily Value Earner
slots.description: No-AF multipliers for daily life.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Security
slots.description: TSA PreCheck and no foreign transaction fees.

slots.name: Travel Value Specialists
slots.description: Cards with the best flight/hotel sweet spots.

rules.title: Net-Zero AF
rules.description: Every card must pay for itself via credits or high multipliers.

rules.title: No FTF
rules.description: Never take a card abroad that charges a 3% fee.

name: Category Hunter
description: You live for quarterly activation day. You want a setup that hits 5-10% in a different category every three months.

slots.name: The Rotating Hub
slots.description: Chase and Discover 5% quarters.

slots.name: The Custom Lock Core
slots.description: Permanent 5% in your top category.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Utility
slots.description: Gas/EV and streaming boosters.

slots.name: Hunter Specialists
slots.description: Cards that catch the overflow at high rates.

rules.title: 12:01 AM Activation
rules.description: Activate your quarters the second they become available.

rules.title: Gift Card Maxing
rules.description: If you won't hit the cap, buy grocery/Amazon gift cards while the 5% is active.

name: Student Starter
tagline: Build 800+ credit while eating out & Ubering
description: You're building your future. You need a setup that costs $0 in annual fees but provides phone insurance, dining rewards, and credit tracking.

slots.name: The Starter Hub
slots.description: Best student cards for easy approval.

slots.name: Food & Fun
slots.description: Dining and entertainment multipliers.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Rent
slots.description: Bilt for rent + phone protection.

slots.name: Credit Specialist
slots.description: Building the file with secured options if needed.

rules.title: Pay in Full
rules.description: Never carry a balance; interest will destroy your rewards value.

rules.title: GPA Credit
rules.description: Always claim your $20 good grade bonus from Discover.

name: Hotel Status Chaser
description: You prioritize where you sleep. You want a setup that provides elite status across all major chains and rewards you for every night stayed.

slots.name: The Hilton Diamond Core
slots.description: Instant Diamond status + resort credits.

slots.name: The Marriott Platinum Hub
slots.description: Instant Platinum and $300 dining credits.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Dining
slots.description: Credits that fund your on-property meals.

slots.name: Hotel Specialists
slots.description: Hyatt and IHG for the best point redemptions.

rules.title: Resort Credit Timing
rules.description: Use your Hilton resort credits semi-annually to stay net-positive on the AF.

rules.title: Transfer Rule
rules.description: Transfer Chase points to Hyatt for 2x+ value compared to other chains.

name: Airline Companion Pass Chaser
tagline: Companion flies free, free bags, lounge access
description: You travel with a partner. You need a setup that handles the logistics of 'two for one' travel and eliminates baggage fees.

slots.name: The Southwest Hub
slots.description: The path to the legendary Companion Pass.

slots.name: The Delta/United Core
slots.description: Companion certificates and club passes.

slots.name: Lifestyle & Food
slots.description: Rideshare and airport dining credits.

slots.name: Airline Specialists
slots.description: Free bags and priority boarding.

rules.title: Certificate Mandatory
rules.description: Never let your annual companion certificate expire; it's the core value of the setup.

rules.title: Free Bag Stack
rules.description: Always check a bag if it's free; don't fight for overhead bin space.
